quoteText: IN NO EVENT SHALL VUDU’S OR CONTENT PROVIDERS’ TOTAL LIABILITY TO YOU FOR ANY AND ALL DAMAGES ARISING FROM THE USE OR INABILITY TO USE THE VUDU WEBSITE, VUDU SERVICE, VUDU DEVICES OR CONTENT, INCLUDING ANY FEATURES ASSOCIATED THEREWITH (OTHER THAN AS MAY BE REQUIRED BY APPLICABLE LAW IN CASES INVOLVING PERSONAL INJURY) EXCEED THE FEES PAID BY YOU DURING THE SIX MONTH PERIOD PRECEDING THE DATE ON WHICH THE CLAIM AROSE.
title: Any liability on behalf of the service is only limited to the fees you paid as a user

tosdr.case: Any liability on behalf of the service is only limited to the fees you paid as a user
